code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EmployeeList(){const[employees,setEmployees]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const fetchEmployees=()=>{fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/employees").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setEmployees(data);setLoading(false);}).catch(err=>{console.error("Error loading phone:",emp.phone);const department=prompt("Enter
